entry.title: API Document
entry.content:
Document Version

Date Doc Version Description Author
2020/12/21 1.0.0 Create this document Wu

API

Overview of AFT API:

Method Endpoint Usage
POST /oauth/token generate access token.
POST /va/create/close create a new close virtual Account.
POST /va/create/open create a new open virtual Account.
POST /va/inquiry inquiry an existing va.
POST /va/inquiry/status inquiry va status.
POST /transfer/internal internal transfer
POST /transfer/internal/inquiry internal transfer account inquiry
POST /transfer/external external transfer
POST /transfer/external/inquiry external transfer account inquiry
POST /transfer/llg llg transfer
POST /transfer/rtgs rtgs transfer
POST /transfer/balance/inquiry inquiry balance

URL

URL that you can access:

URL Usage
https://dev.afinpay.co.id Development
https://api.afinpay.co.id Production

Bank Code >>

Response Code >>

。。。

entry.title: Response Code
entry.content:
Response Code Desc
0 Success 成功
1000 Normal Error
1111 Unknown Error
2000 link down 系统错误
2001 Check signature fail 签名校验失败
2003 Bank/Channel Not Found 系统不支持该银行
2004 Provider System Link Down: DUBBO
2010 Invalid Parameter 入参错误，详情
2011 Param Format Error
2012 Bank Response Error
2013 Json Format Error
2100 Invalid Ip Address
2101 PublicKey Invalid
2102 PrivateKey Not Found
2103 Timestamp Format Error
2104 Access Denied
2200 Order is not exist
2201 Inquiry Balance Error
2202 This Channel Not Exist
3000 Merchant setting not config 商户配置
3001 Merchant has no Access 商户配置
3002 Merchant channel rate is not found for UID 商户配置
3003
3010 Phone not found
3100 Bank does not operate or bank host uncreachable 银行未响应
3101 Switching does not operate or Switching host uncreachable
3200 Insufficient fund 余额不足
3204 Exceed Withdrawal/Deposit Amount Limit 提现受限
3210 Exceed Transaction Amount limit 超出交易额度
3212 Amount Transaction is Under RTGS limit Amount 不够RTGS
3220 duplicate transmission 重复提交
3221 already paid 已支付
3300 Suspected Fraud 可疑
4000 restricted card 受限信用卡
5000 incorrect OTP
5001 expired OTP
5002 transaction need OTP
401 Unauthorized

entry.title: Virtual Account Type
entry.content:
Type Desc
c Fixed Payment: invoice/billing should be paid with exctly the same amount as requested.
o Open Payment：invoice/billing can be paid multipel times as long as it is still active.
i Installment/partial Payment: invoice/billing can be paid multiple times as long as paid amount is less than the requested amount and still active.
m Minimum Payment: invoice/billing can be paid with greater than or equal to the requested amount.
n Open Minimum Payment: invoice/billing can be paid with greater than or equal to the requested amount multiple times as long as it is still active.
x Minimum Payment: invoice/billing can be paid with less than or equal to the requested amount multiple times as long as it is still active.

Token >

Signature >

entry.title: Signature
entry.content:
Signature is used by AFT to verify that your request is not altered by attackers.

The outline of the HMAC validation process is as follows:

  1. Retrieve Timestamp from HTTP Header (X-AFT-Timestamp)

  2. Retrieve the API Key form HTTP Header (X-AFT-Key)

  3. Lookup the API Secret corresponding to the received key in internal store

  4. Retrieve client HMAC from HTTP Header lowercase hexadecimal format (X-AFT-Signature)

  5. Calculate HMAC using the API Secret as the HMAC secret key

  6. Compare client HMAC with calculated HMAC

Headers

Name Type Description
Content-Type AN Content of you request body e.g.
application/json
Authorization AN OAuth 2 token
Format value : Bearer {access_token}
X-AFT-Key AN Your API key generated by AFT
X-AFT-Timestamp yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.sssTZD Timestamp generated by merchant in ISO 8601 e.g.
“2020-12-25T09:54:00.234Z”
X-AFT-Signature AN Signature

Generate Signature

SHA-256 HMAC is used to generate the signature with your API secret as the key.

The StringToSign will be a colon-separated list derived from some request data as below :

HexEncode are optional to use, use it if the SHA-256 returns a binary stream.

Details about the data used to derived The StringToSign is explained in the next sections.

HTTP Method

  1. HTTP Method is HTTP Method such as GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE.

  2. HTTP method must be given in upper case.

AccessToken

  1. AccessToken is an OAuth 2 access token retrieved from the HTTP Authorization header.

RequestBody

  1. RequestBody need to be hashed with SHA-256.

  2. If the RequestBody is empty, set it to empty string.

  3. RequestBody should be canonicalized before computing the SHA-256 hash.

Timestamp

  1. The timestamp must be presented in ISO8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssTZD)

    YYYY = four-digit year

    MM = two-digit month (01=January, etc.)

    DD = two-digit day of month (01 through 31)

    T = literal ‘T’ as date and time separator

    hh = two digits of hour (00 through 23) (am/pm NOT allowed)

    mm = two digits of minute (00 through 59)

    ss = two digits of second (00 through 59)

    sss = three digits representing millisecond (000 through 999)

    TZD = time zone designator (Z or +hh:mm or -hh:mm)

entry.title: Token
entry.content:
This endpoint is used to generate token. This token is required for making an API call. Put this token in Authorization header.

HTTP Request

Request Header

Key Value Mandatory
Content-Type application/x-www-form-urlencoded Yes
Authorization Basic Base64(client_id:client_secret) Yes

Request Body

Field Data Type Mandatory Value
grant_type string Yes client_credentials

Request Sample

Response Sample

entry.title: Balance
entry.content:
This endpoint is used to inquiry merchant balance.

HTTP Request

Request Header

Key Value Mandatory
Authorization Bearer {access_token} Yes
Content-Type application/json Yes
X-AFT-Key {api_key} Yes
X-AFT-Timestamp yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ Yes
X-AFT-Signature refer to signature Yes

Request Body

Field Data Type Mandatory Description
appId String Yes Merchant Id
version String No version

Request Sample

Response Body

Field Data Type Mandatory Description
appId String Yes Merchant Id
version String Yes version
nonceStr String Yes Unique String
resCode String Yes Response Code
resMsg String Yes Response Message
balance Number Yes Merchant Balance

Response Simple

Error Simple

entry.title: External Inquiry
entry.content:
This endpoint is used to check account no from other bank before transfer.

HTTP Request

Request Header

Key Value Mandatory
Authorization Bearer {access_token} Yes
Content-Type application/json Yes
X-AFT-Key {api_key} Yes
X-AFT-Timestamp yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ Yes
X-AFT-Signature refer to signature Yes

Request Body

Field Data Type Mandatory Description
appId String Yes Merchant Id
version String No version
bankCode String Yes Channel/Bank Code, Details to >
sourceAccount String Yes Source Account
destinationBankCode String Yes Destination Bank Code
beneficiaryAccount String Yes Beneficiary Account

Request Sample

Response Body

Field Data Type Mandatory Description
appId String Yes Merchant Id
version String Yes version
nonceStr String Yes Unique String
resCode String Yes Response Code
resMsg String Yes Response Message
status boolean Yes Account Status

Response Simple

Error Simple

entry.title: External Transfer
entry.content:
This endpoint is used to transfer from one bank account to other bank account.

HTTP Request

Request Header

Key Value Mandatory
Authorization Bearer {access_token} Yes
Content-Type application/json Yes
X-AFT-Key {api_key} Yes
X-AFT-Timestamp yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ Yes
X-AFT-Signature refer to signature Yes

Request Body

Field Data Type Mandatory Description
appId String Yes Merchant ID
version String No Version
bankCode String Yes Channel/Bank Code, Details to >
destinationBankCode String Yes Destination Bank Code
creditAccountNo String Yes Credit Account No.
debitAccountNo String Yes Debit Account No.
valueCurrency String Yes Currency: IDR
beneficiaryEmailAddress String No Beneficiary Email Address
beneficiaryAddress1 String Yes Beneficiary Address 1
beneficiaryAddress2 String No Beneficiary Address 2
beneficiaryName String Yes Beneficiary Name
valueDate Date Yes yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss
valueAmount Number Yes payment Amount
outOrderNo String Yes Out Order No.
remark String No description

Request Sample

Response Body

Field Data Type Mandatory Description
appId String Yes Merchant ID
version String Yes Version
nonceStr String Yes Unique String
resCode String Yes Response Code
resMsg String Yes Response Message
orderNo String Yes Order No.
outOrderNo String Yes Out Order No.
debitAccountNo String Yes Debit Account No.
creditAccountNo String Yes Credit Account No.
valueAmount String Yes Payment Amount.
valueCurrency String Yes Currency: IDR
beneficiaryEmailAddress String Yes Beneficiary Email Address
status String Yes Status

Response Simple

Error Simple

Internal Transfer >>

Internal Inquiry >>

External Transfer >>

External Inquiry >>

RTGS Transfer >>

LLG Transfer >>

Balance>>

destinationBankCode String Yes Destination Bank Code

Field Data Type Mandatory Description
appId String Yes Merchant Id
version String Yes version
nonceStr String Yes Unique String
resCode String Yes Response Code
resMsg String Yes Response Message

Error Simple

beneficiaryAddress2 String No Beneficiary Address 2

entry.title: Create Close VA
entry.content:
This endpoint is used to create new virtual account.

HTTP Request

Request Header

Key Value Mandatory
Authorization Bearer {access_token} Yes
Content-Type application/json Yes
X-AFT-Key {api_key} Yes
X-AFT-Timestamp yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ Yes
X-AFT-Signature refer to signature Yes

Request Body

Field Data Type Mandatory Description
appId String Yes Merchant ID
amount String Yes amount
billingType String Yes virtual account type, “c”, Detail to >
outOrderNo String Yes Merchant Order No.
customerName String Yes Customer Name
customerEmail String No Customer Email
customerPhone String No Customer Phone
datetimeExpired Date No Datetime Expired: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss
version String No API Version(default: 1.0.0)
bankCode String Yes Channel/Bank Code, Details to >
description String No description

Request Sample

Response Body

Field Data Type Mandatory Description
appId String Yes Merchant ID
version String Yes API Version
nonceStr String Yes Unique String
resCode String Yes Response Code
resMsg String Yes Response Message
orderNo String Yes AFT order No.
outOrderNo String Yes Out Order No.
virtualAccount String Yes Virtual Account
virtualAccountType String Yes Virtual Account Type
amount String Yes amount

Response Sample

Error Sample

entry.content:
This endpoint is used to get status from an existing virtual account.

Key Value Mandatory
Authorization Bearer {access_token} Yes
Content-Type application/json Yes
X-AFT-Key {api_key} Yes
X-AFT-Timestamp yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ Yes
X-AFT-Signature refer to signature Yes

Request Body

Field Data Type Mandatory Description
appId String Yes Merchant ID
version String No Version
virtualAccount String Yes Virtual Account

Request Sample

Response Body

Field Data Type Mandatory Description
appId String Yes Merchant ID
version String Yes Version
nonceStr String Yes Unique String
resCode String Yes Response Code
resMsg String Yes Response Message
outOrderNo String Yes Out Order No.
orderNo String Yes Order No.
virtualAccount String Yes Virtual Account
status String Yes Virtual Account Status

Response Simple

Error Simple

entry.title: Inquiry VA
entry.content:
This endpoint is used to get virtual account information that has been created.

HTTP Request

Request Header

Key Value Mandatory
Authorization Bearer {access_token} Yes
Content-Type application/json Yes
X-AFT-Key {api_key} Yes
X-AFT-Timestamp yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ Yes
X-AFT-Signature refer to signature Yes

Request Body

Field Data Type Mandatory Description
appId String Yes Merchant ID
version String No Version
virtualAccount String Option Virtual Account
outOrderNo String Option Out Order No.

Request Sample

Response Body

Field Data Type Mandatory Description
appId String Yes Merchant ID
version String Yes Version
nonceStr String Yes Unique String
resCode String Yes Response Code
resMsg String Yes Response Message
amount String Yes virtual Account Amount
orderNo String Yes order No.
virtualAccount String Yes virtual Account
outOrderNo String Yes out Order No.
paymentAmount String Yes Payment Amount
cumulativePaymentAmount String Yes Cumulative Payment Amount
billingType String Yes Billing Type
datetimeExpired Date Yes Datetime Expired
datetimePayment Date Yes Datetime Payment
customerName String Yes Customer Name
customerPhone String Yes Customer Phone
customerEmail String Yes Customer Email
paymentNtb String Yes Payment Ntb
description String Yes Description
status String Yes Virtual Account Status

Response Sample

Error Sample
